THE CAT WHO LOVED HIS HAT
There once was cat who loved his WHITE hat. He wore it everyday, no matter what. He wore it in the sun.
He wore it in the house. He wore it in the rain.
He wore it on the train. He wore it when he ate.
He wore it when he slept. He wore it everyday no matter where he went.
